name: QUALITY FLY
about: Quality Fly is a premier flight school based in Madrid, Spain, renowned for its innovative and comprehensive airline pilot training programs. We offer the EASA Integrated ATPL course, featuring cutting-edge modules such as APS MCC, UPRT, and KSA, along with training in a state-of-the-art glass cockpit fleet and an A320 Full Flight Simulator Level D. With a highly international student body from over 35 nationalities, our training is delivered 100% in English. Our fleet includes new generation aircraft like the Tecnam P2006T and Cessna 172S, ensuring high efficiency and safety. We pride ourselves on a 90% first-time pass rate in theoretical knowledge and 95% in flight training, with a dedicated team providing one-to-one reinforcement and career advice. Quality Fly is committed to operational excellence, making us the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a high-quality, affordable education. Join us to embark on a journey to excellence in aviation.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
